internalConditions.question: How would you rate your outer appearance and facial features during this stage of your life?
How would you rate the capability of your 5 sense organs: eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and skin during this stage of your life?
How would you rate your physical stamina and agility during this stage of your life?

externalConditions.question: How politically and economically stable was your country of birth or residence during this stage of your life?
How was your home situation during this stage of your life? This includes your financial situation, your relationship with your parents and siblings, and the stability of your home environment.
How was your relationship with people outside of your home during this stage of your life? This could include external relatives, teachers, friends, etc.

internalConditions.question: How would you rate the quality of your daily life activities, memory, comprehension, language learning ability, and ability to express yourself during this period of your life?
How would you rate your learning ability in science, math, literature, etc. during this period of your life?
How talented were you in the arts during this stage of your life? (art, drawing, dancing, singing, etc.)

externalConditions.question: How good of an influence did people who were close to you have on your values during this stage of your life? (including grandparents, parents, siblings, nannies, friends, and schoolmates)
How good of an influence did your teachers and mentors have on your values during this stage of your life? (kindergarten, elementary school, high school, university, post-graduate schools)
How good of an influence did the media that you consumed have on your values during this stage of your life? (books, TV, movies, social media, internet)

internalConditions.question: How would you rate your politeness, interpersonal and communication skills during this stage of your life?
How would you rate your emotional management skills during this stage of your life? (regular emotion management, emotion management due to illnesses)

How would you rate your conflict management skills within relationships during this stage of your life? (for ex: relationships with parents, siblings, children, relatives, friends, and work environment)

externalConditions.question: How positively did your political and economic situation impact your emotional stability during this stage of your life?
How positively did your cultural and gender situation impact your emotional stability during this stage of your life?
How positively did your family values and economic situation affect your emotional stability during this stage of your life?

internalConditions.question: How would you rate your ethical conduct (morality) and ability to choose between right and wrong during this stage of your life?
How would you rate your behaviour and compassion towards people and animals during this stage of your life?
How would you rate your optimism and positive attitude during this stage of your life?
How would you rate your understanding of impermanence, imperfection, and suffering during this stage of your life?
descriptionList: Impermanence: highs will not always be highs, lows will not always be lows
Imperfection: perfection does not exist and is impossible to reach
Suffering: understanding that suffering is part of life
Consciousness is the ability to suffer‚Äù in Buddhism suffering is not negative, it is just a state of being (just the way it is)

externalConditions.question: How would you rate the spiritual openness of your country or family/localized community in this stage of your life?
descriptionList: This would be room to explore your spirituality, rigidity of religious dogmas and/or spiritual options

externalConditions.question: How would you rate the quality of your spiritual influences during this stage of your life? (This can come from parents, teachers, spiritual guides, and practitioners)
